mapper.insert:
insert into plan_list (user_id, plan_title, update_time) value(#{userId}, #{planTitle}, now())
select last_insert_id()

insert into plan_seq (plan_no, plan_seq, content_id) values
(#{planNo}, #{seq.planSeq}, #{seq.contentId})
mapper.update: update plan_list set plan_title = #{planTitle}, update_time = now() where plan_no = #{planNo}
mapper.select: select l.plan_no, l.user_id, m.user_nickname, l.plan_title, l.update_time, (select a.first_image from plan_seq s join attraction_info a on s.content_id = a.content_id where l.plan_no = s.plan_no and a.first_image != "" order by s.plan_seq limit 1) as image from plan_list l join trip_member m on l.user_id = m.user_id where l.user_id = #{userId}

select l.plan_no, l.user_id, m.user_nickname, l.plan_title, l.update_time, (select a.first_image from plan_seq s join attraction_info a on s.content_id = a.content_id where l.plan_no = s.plan_no and a.first_image != "" order by s.plan_seq limit 1) as image from plan_list l join trip_member m on l.user_id = m.user_id where l.plan_title like concat('%', #{word}, '%') and l.user_id = #{userId}
select l.plan_no, l.user_id, m.user_nickname, l.plan_title, l.update_time from plan_list l join trip_member m on l.user_id = m.user_id where plan_no = #{planNo}

select s.content_id, s.plan_seq, a.title, a.first_image, d.overview from plan_seq s join attraction_info a on s.content_id = a.content_id join attraction_description d on s.content_id = d.content_id where s.plan_no = #{planNo} order by s.plan_seq
